title: Macbook Air 13 (820-3437) issue with ssd recognition
message:
Macbook when installing from usb recognise internal ssd and format,and when it pass first part of installation restart with flashing folder ,I try to start with another ssd from different macbook still wont boot from it,but again if i boot from installation usb its recognise ssd in disk utility,I check all rails from ssd connector is ok
ASD test passed with no error

title: Macbook Air 13 (820-3437) issue with ssd recognition
message:
Which OSX do you want to install?
Did you test the machine with preinstalled OSX pendrive?

title: Macbook Air 13 (820-3437) issue with ssd recognition
message: i try el capitan usb,mojave no difference ,didnt try preinstaled usb ,could be the bios maybe

title: Macbook Air 13 (820-3437) issue with ssd recognition
message: Try USB OSX and also run ASD EFI version.

title: Macbook Air 13 (820-3437) issue with ssd recognition
message: I mistake with efi file ,reflash with 2631 instead 2632 ,thats maybe cause the not finishing installation ,i try few 2632 but loading bar stuck .can u post me clean me bios emc2632 thx

title: Macbook Air 13 (820-3437) issue with ssd recognition
message:
I'm sure links for clean ME 3437 BIOS are already posted on the forum.
You'll probably need to change serial numer.
Do you have Medusa programmer?
Upload your backup, if need to fix Fsys checksum too.

title: Macbook Air 13 (820-3437) issue with ssd recognition
message: Im not allowed to upload bios file
